body:
+ Eliminate `install` method (use the one from CMakePackage).
+ Move configure options to new method `cmake_args` and eliminate the `+debug` variant as it might conflict with `build_type=` and is redundant with `build_type=Debug +gdb`.
+ Move special install instructions for DarwinOS to a `run_after` method.

This needs to be tested on Darwin OS before being merged.  I am unable to test the `darwin_fix` method.
title: Upgrade recipe for parmetis to be a CMakePackage
